text:
My #TwoCentWealthTax on the richest top 0.1% of households will pay for:
✅ #UniversalChildCare
✅ Universal free public college
✅ $50 billion investment in HBCUs
✅ Cancelling student loan debt for 95% of the people who have it
✅ And more!
#DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EG9pgnXWoAMt7eB.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1184276617062944770/vid/480x270/iAa4i3MpyLyg1z3D.mp4?tag=13

We have a massive crisis in our democracy with the way big tech companies are being used, not just in terms of anti-competitive practices, but also to undermine our democracy. The practices that were abused in 2016 still haven’t been addressed. #DemDebate

RT @LCVoters Trump is ignoring the science and rolling back protections for wildlife just to give away protected places to Big Polluters. 

Speak out now to stop the Trump administration from rolling back protections for endangered species.

https://p2a.co/2oBY3v5?p2asource=C4ORTWCESA02
When we are in the White House, that is exactly what we will do. https://twitter.com/AOC/status/1184269930704916481 QT @AOC Tax the rich.

Let's be clear. Under Medicare for All:

✅ Premiums are gone
✅ Deductibles are gone
✅ Copayments are gone

#DemDebate
There is no job I would undertake with more passion than bringing people together around an agenda that works for every person in this country, rather than just the 1% and corporate elite. #DemDebate

Did you know there are more than 700,000 Latino-owned businesses in Texas? In 2018, Texas was ranked as one of the top 5 🖐️most popular states for Hispanic small business owners. #HispanicHeritageMonth http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EG74Ii6XkAABa8r.jpg

Let’s be clear: Whenever someone hears the term “Medicare for all who want it,” it really means “Medicare for all who can afford it.” #MedicareForAll is the gold standard—that’s how we make sure everyone gets health care. #DemDebate
Damn right we will guarantee a job for every American. #DemDebate

RT @CoryForIowa We're proud to recognize @RafaelMorataya this #LatinxHeritageMonth for his work as the executive director of the Center for Worker Justice of Eastern Iowa. In his fight for social and economic justice, Rafael's work with CWJ has uplifted Iowans whose voices often go unheard. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EG8_hQ8XUAATjuL.jpg

We need to get our troops out of Syria, but we need to do it the right way. Donald Trump has sucked up to dictators, cut and run on our allies, and worsened a humanitarian crisis in Syria. We need a president who makes our country and the world safer. #DemDebate
Californians, spread the word: open enrollment for a health insurance plan through @CoveredCA begins today and runs through January 31, 2020. Sign up at http://www.CoveredCA.com and #GetCovered.
Trump is the most corrupt president in the history of this country. #DemDebate

Big tech giants are able to use their power to limit competition and undermine small businesses. You get to be the umpire or you get to have a team in the game—but you don't get to do both at the same time. We need to #BreakUpBigTech. #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EG96xpHWkAA4pgR.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1184298943955570688/vid/480x270/qPT7-4VuKQTSrcUg.mp4?tag=13

We need to expand disclosure of fundraising and spending. The system of money for influence is helped at every stage by secrecy. We need to require additional disclosures by presidential campaigns, update laws for online political advertising, and bring dark money into the light.
Tax the billionaires.

Donald Trump sold out the Kurds and gave hundreds of ISIS fighters a get-out-of-jail-free card. There are only four winners: Russia, Iran, Assad, and ISIS. 

This madness has to stop. #DemDebate

Am I in favor of sending pharmaceutical executives to jail for flooding communities with opioids?

Yes, I am. 

#DemDebate

RT @Heritage Socialists love saying socialism has never failed because it's never been tried.

In truth, it has failed everywhere it has been tried—from the Soviet Union to three modern countries that tried but ultimately rejected socialism: Israel, India, and the UK. https://www.nationalreview.com/2019/10/failure-of-socialism-israel-india-united-kingdom-adopted-free-market-policies-and-prospered/
Who wants to keep us in endless wars? Why are liberals being hypocrites? Why are republicans against the president? Tune in to @FoxNews as I join @IngrahamAngle right now!
RT @MichaelSkolnik Cory Booker is one incredible human being. What an amazing closing statement!! #DemDebate

When it comes to education, we're going to think big, not small.

We are going to invest in our educators and tear down the barriers that prevent our kids from getting an equal, quality education. https://iowastartingline.com/2019/10/12/school-board-member-why-sanders-is-best-for-iowa-students/

My Marijuana Opportunity Act would help do just that.

“Women should not be the only ones taking up this cause … women are people, and people deserve to control their own bodies.” —Cory at #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EG9eWNeW4AAe9JZ.png

“I stand with unions because right now, unions in America are under attack.” —Cory at #DemDebate

We are seeing a stratification of wealth and income in this country. We must fight so that all union members have strong bargaining rights, good working conditions and a living wage.

It was so great to meet Gabrielle Marie Perez and Geisel Dieguez, who won the @TeamWarren contest to join me at tonight's #DemDebate! Together, we're fighting for big, structural change, so students like them can have a brighter future. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EG9KgQ-WwAEY3VW.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EG9KgQ9X0AEd8_0.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EG9KgQ_XYAEMYXP.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EG9KgQ-WwAAKvzc.jpg

When I am president, I will have the guts to appoint an attorney general who will:

✅ Break up monopolies
✅ Protect small businesses
✅ Protect consumers by ending price fixing

#DemDebate

RT @rashadrobinson Excited to share the new @votingwhileblk podcast. Hear me get to the bottom of what the 2020 candidates will do to fight through barriers to racial justice as I ask questions often ignored during the #DemDebate. 1st episode ft. Sen. @berniesanders: http://linktr.ee/votingwhileblack https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1184145156284604417 QT @nowthisnews .@BernieSanders was arrested while leading a sit-in against segregated housing in the 1960s — and his commitment to racial justice has only expanded in the decades since (via @votingwhileblk) http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EG7QRDdW4AAo4Gd.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1184111580994248710/vid/320x320/XSCW0H9is51kEd-n.mp4?tag=13

We need a president who will repair the damage Donald Trump has done to our country and make justice and opportunity real for every American. I know I can be that president. Tune in now to tonight’s #DemDebate to hear me share my message of healing: https://www.cnn.com/politics/live-news/democratic-debate-october-2019/index.html
Billionaires should not exist. #DemDebate

Eight people will die from gun violence during this debate alone. 

I'm done. It is time to act. #DemDebate

RT @PramilaJayapal Yes, @BernieSanders: totally right. We have to have the guts to take on the totally dysfunctional healthcare system we have right now — and that means taking on the private for-profit companies that are the only ones benefiting from our current system.

People across this country want an America that works for all of us. I know what's broken, I know how to fix it, and I'm building a grassroots movement to get it done. #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1184316132653752352/img/RfXuRn0iYmICP5HM.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1184316132653752352/vid/320x320/nXO5zk-nnsE3ltVV.mp4?tag=13

GOP only has tears for billionaires & outrage towards “others.”

Democrats win when we call out what’s broken, come up with a plan to fix it, and when we give people a reason to get in the fight. This is about more than just one phone call. It’s about a concerted effort by Donald Trump and those around him to abuse our diplomatic relationships for his personal political gain. He must be impeached—and everyone involved must be held accountable. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/10/14/us/politics/bolton-giuliani-fiona-hill-testimony.html
Unfettered capitalism created the opioid epidemic. That is why we need a political revolution to say enough is enough. #DemDebate

Our democracy shouldn’t be bought and paid for by the wealthy and powerful. It belongs to all of us. Getting big money out of politics is a critical part of fighting corruption and making the big, structural change that we need.
Tax the rich.

If Trump had his way, my story and millions like it would not be possible. #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EG9-3QVWkAES7vi.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1184304156800102400/vid/480x270/_joycQZ3l_XaSQf4.mp4?tag=13

Trump may think a big campaign check qualifies someone to represent our country abroad—but I don’t. I've pledged to not participate in the corrupt practice of selling cushy diplomatic posts to wealthy donors. And my new plan to get big money out of politics goes further.

We’re all looking forward to strengthening America's middle class. It’s why I have a new plan for expanding Social Security—starting with an extra $200 a month that will lift millions of seniors out of poverty. #DemDebate https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/social-security

500,000 Americans are homeless.

87 million are uninsured or underinsured.

45 million have student debt.

All while 3 people own more wealth than the bottom half.

We cannot afford a billionaire class whose greed and corruption is at war with the working class of this country.

RT @davepell Cory Booker’s strategy is dead-on for the general election.

Come together. Unify. Pull everyone up.

Hate, even hate of the other party, plays into Trump’s hands.
Once again we're talking about health care — but not a single question on the nationwide attack on reproductive health and rights. Women are half of this country, and they deserve better. #DemDebate

We’ve had a lot of problems losing jobs. The reason is bad trade policy and giant multinational corporations that have no loyalty to American workers. They’re only loyal to their own bottom line. I have a plan to fix that. #DemDebate https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/new-approach-trade

Private media outlets charge outrageous sums to run ads during presidential primary debates like tonight's—and many of their advertisers have vested interest in who is elected.

This type of influence must end.

We're going to ban advertising during presidential primary debates.
